SETTINGS_PAGE_SETTINGS_GROUP_MAIN_DESCRI: Basic CMS settings that allow you to configure the basic functionality and properties of the CMS.
SETTINGS_PAGE_SETTINGS_GROUP_SEO_DESCRIP: Search engine optimization (SEO) settings are necessary to make it easier for search engine robots to find your site.
SETTINGS_PAGE_SETTINGS_GROUP_SECURITY_DE: Security issues are very important in our time, so pay more attention to this factor.
SETTINGS_PAGE_SETTING_BASE_TITLE_DESCRIP: The name of the site is an important attribute for searching the Internet, so name the site in such a way that it reflects the essence of its content.
SETTINGS_PAGE_SETTING_BASE_TIMEZONE_DESC: The time zone can cause events on the site to be relative to the selected time zone. If necessary, the server's time zone will be taken.
SETTINGS_PAGE_SETTING_BASE_LOCALE_SITE_D: Localization will allow you to translate the site to understandable for users of your site.
SETTINGS_PAGE_SETTING_BASE_LOCALE_ADMIN_: Localization will allow you to translate the CMS into a language you understand.
SETTINGS_PAGE_SETTING_BASE_TEMPLATE_DESC: Choose a template that will be used as the look of your site. Note that templates are identified in the ./templates folder.
SETTINGS_PAGE_SETTING_BASE_ENGINEERING_W: If you need to carry out technical work on the site, then enable them, after which a special stub will be displayed instead of the site.
